name: 🍋 Adokar 🍋
description:
My submission for the The Bad Game Jam (Hosted by B.A.D. Collective).  Built from a long forgotten 20-year-old game prototype that was gathering digital dust.  Now the story of a mysterious lemon can be told... 🍋

Controls

Movement: up, left, right

Level skip: d

To load game, do nothing at "LOAD" screen.
